message: Let's be reasonable, 60-40 is a good starting point.
I understand you want a larger share, but I need a bit more than that. How about 48-52?
I'm willing to compromise, but I still think I deserve the larger share. 58-42 is my new offer.
This is a fair offer, Alice. I'm losing money faster, and we both need to agree soon.
I see you're getting anxious, but I still think I can get a better deal. 57-43 is my new offer. Time is on my side.
Alice, we're running out of time! This is hurting me more than you. Let's settle on 46-54 before it's too late for both of us.
